ygData.subject: Re: I cant stand it any longer!  was RE: bards agi & dodge
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I m glad you posted this as I had also heard it but my source wasn t quite as unimpeachable as yours so I didn t want to get into a big flame war about it.
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, Aug 27/99, James Schuldes <jgs@...> wrote:
> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> How could I possibly know all this??? Well, you yourself can ask Brad
> McQuaid next time you meet him at Gencon or somewhere. I asked if JM was at
> the con and Brad certainly knew his name and told me he was a beta tester
> they got to know very well.

I'm glad you posted this as I had also heard it but my source wasn't
quite as unimpeachable as yours so I didn't want to get into a big flame
war about it. My same source (another beta tester from P2 on) also said
JM's main char through most of beta was a rogue. Still, he seemed to
know a fair bit about bards and had some useful information. Shame he
seems to be gone.


--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
